edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.batchIngest.data
Class BatchIngestOptions

java.lang.Object
  edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.batchIngest.data.BatchIngestOptions

public class BatchIngestOptions
extends java.lang.Object

Contains user options that control the batch ingest. These options are typically set with data returned from a web form.

Author:
chet.rebman

Method Detail

isStopOnError

public boolean isStopOnError()
If true the batch ingest is stopped on the first error. Normally this is set false and Non Fatal errors are simply logged.

Returns:
true to stop on error.

setStopOnError

public void setStopOnError(boolean isStopOnError)
